name: Desert Dash (itch) (Jake Mills' Games)
description:
Desert Dash is a 3D Driving and Shoot-em-up experience. Defeat the enemy vehicles for as long as you can! Game Info

Drive through the Desert and blast the oncoming smuggler vehicles with your onboard lasers! Pick up Rockets for even more firepower and collect Crates to spend on cool new paint jobs! 

Version Info

The current version is 1.0.1. This is the first publicly available version and this game will not receive any further development.

Controls

Use WASD or Arrow keys to move side to side, the car auto-accelerates. Press Control or Left Click to shoot. Controller may be supported but is untested.

Installation

Installation couldn't be simpler, just double-click the downloaded executable and it will extract the files you need. Then open up the folder and launch the game!

Disclaimer

This is the first 3D game I ever made, and it is far from perfect, so go easy on me.

Enjoy Playing!
